item.description:
We will start off the evening “As always Food at 6:00 Meeting at 7:00”

This will be a business meeting with some tips on nighttime take offs. We will also be discussing the upcoming Open House.

Aaaaaaaand we will be drawing the winner of the 2013 Oshkosh raffle!

Where else can you have this much

excitement for $30 bucks a year?

NOTE: UNFORTUNATLY DUE TO THE SEQUESTRATION AND OTHER ISSUES MIKE GOULIAN WILL NOT BE AT OUR MAY MEETING. WE ARE WORKING WITH HIM TO SCHEDULE SOMETHING FOR LATER IN THE YEAR.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
